sn23.34:1.3: “sadhu me, bhante, bhagava sankhittena dhammam desetu, yamaham bhagavato dhammam sutva eko vupakattho appamatto atapi pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn23.34:2.1: “Yo kho, radha, nirodhadhammo; tatra te chando pahatabbo, rago pahatabbo, chandarago pahatabbo.
sn23.34:2.3: Rupam kho, radha, nirodhadhammo; tatra te chando pahatabbo …pe…
sn23.34:2.4: vedana nirodhadhammo; tatra te chando pahatabbo …pe…
sn23.34:2.5: sanna nirodhadhammo; tatra te chando pahatabbo …pe…
sn23.34:2.6: sankhara nirodhadhammo; tatra te chando pahatabbo …pe…
sn23.34:2.7: vinnanam nirodhadhammo; tatra te chando pahatabbo …pe…
sn23.34:2.8: yo kho, radha, nirodhadhammo; tatra te chando pahatabbo, rago pahatabbo, chandarago pahatabbo”ti.
